SA11sanss17u:6_0: varjayaty akṣaṇāny aṣṭau yae ime deśitā mayā /
SA11sanss17u:10_0: sthāmnā balena côpeto nâsau kausīdyam ṛcchati [[DOUBT]] //
SA11sanss17u:11_0: āḍhyo mahādhanaś câsau adhṛṣyaḥ puṇyavān api /
SA11sanss17u:14_0: bhaved dānapatiḥ śūro muktatyāgo hy amatsarī //
SA11sanss17u:18_0: rājye pratiṣṭhito buddhān satkaroti punaḥ punaḥ //
SA11sanss17u:19_0: ścyuta/ câsmād gataḥ svargaṃ prasanno jinaśāsane /
SA11sanss17u:21_0: na śakyaṃ bhāṣatā varṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
SA11sanss17u:22_0: ya stūpaṃ lokanāthasya naraḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam //
SA11sanss17u:24_0: na jātu so 'ndhaḥ khañjo vā kalpānām api koṭibhiḥ /
SA11sanss17u:25_0: utpādya bodhicittaṃ yaḥ śāstu stūpaṃ hi vandate //
SA11sanss17u:28_0: yo buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrān kalpān koṭī ca tuliya satkarayā /
SA11sanss17u:29_0: yaś cêha kalpe caramaka ghorakāle vandeya stūpaṃ bahutara tasya puṇyam //
SA11sanss17u:31_0: agro hi buddho 'tuliya dakṣiṇīyo 'grāṃ caritvā cariyaviśeṣa prāptaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:32_0: tasyêha pūjāṃ karia narariṣabhasya vipāka śreṣṭho bhavati atulyarūpaḥ //
SA11sanss17u:34_0: vimānaṃ labhate tatra vicitraṃ ratanām ayam //
SA11sanss17u:39_0: bhuktvā ca tāṃ ratiṃ divyāṃ āyuḥ saṃpūrya paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:40_0: cyutvā ca devalokāt sa manuṣyo bhavati bhogavān //
SA11sanss17u:43_0: satkṛtaḥ syāc ca sarvatra caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
SA11sanss17u:44_0: cakravartī ca rājâsau śakraś ca bhavatîśvaraḥ /
SA11sanss17u:45_0: brahmā ca brahmalokasmin caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
SA11sanss17u:47_0: sarve 'syârthāḥ samṛdhyanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ //
SA11sanss17u:48_0: tyajed dhīnān akuśalān na sa tatrôpapadyate /
SA11sanss17u:51_0: priyaḥ sadayitaś câsau satkṛtaś ca praśaṃsitaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:52_0: davānām atha nāgānāṃ ye lokesmiṃś ca paṇḍitāḥ //
SA11sanss17u:54_0: te kulāḥ satkṛtā bhonti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca //
SA11sanss17u:56_0: yaḥ sarṣapāt sūkṣmataraṃ gṛhītvā dhūpeya dhūpaṃ bhagavati caityakeṣu /
SA11sanss17u:57_0: tasyânuśaṃsān śṛṇuta prabhāṣato me prasannacittā jahiya khilāṃ malāṃś ca //
SA11sanss17u:58_0: sa puṇyavāṃś carati diśaḥ samantād ārogyaprāpto dṛḍhamatir apramattaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:59_0: vineti śokaṃ vicarati cārikāyāṃ priyo manāpo bhavati mahājanasya //
SA11sanss17u:60_0: rājyaṃ ca labdhvā jina varu satkarotī mahânubhāvo vidu cakravartī /
SA11sanss17u:61_0: suvarṇavarṇo vicitralakṣaṇaiḥ sa manojñagandhān labhi sarvaloke //
SA11sanss17u:64_0: yaś cīvareṇa caityeṣu kuryāt pūjām atulāṃ nāyakānāṃ /
SA11sanss17u:65_0: tasyêha bhotī asadṛśu ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
SA11sanss17u:68_0: siṃhalatāḥ suruciravarṇasūtrā veṭhitva stūpaṃ bhagavata cīvarebhiḥ //
SA11sanss17u:69_0: datvā patākāṃ bhagavata cetikeṣū chandaṃ janitvā tatha siya buddhaloke /
SA11sanss17u:70_0: sa pūjanīyo bhavati mahājanasya carantu śreṣṭho jinacārikāye /
SA11sanss17u:70_1: /suvarṇavarṇo bhavati si ātmabhāvo lābhī sa bhotī suruciracīvarāṇāṃ /
SA11sanss17u:72_0: karpāsikānāṃ susahita kambalānāṃ dukūlakānāṃ tatha varakauśakānāṃ //
SA11sanss17u:73_0: dhvajaṃ daditvā hataraji satvasāre dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratilabhi na cireṇa /
SA11sanss17u:74_0: prabhūtakoṣo bhavati anantaprajño paricāru tasya bhavaty adīnacittaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:75_0: na cittaśūlaṃ janayati so parasya prasādacittaḥ sadâpramattaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:76_0: na tasyâgniḥ kramati viṣannaśastraṃ udvīkṣaṇīyo bhavati mahājanasya //
SA11sanss17u:78_0: adho upādāya ca vibhavâgru yāvat jāmbūnadaṃ tena bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ /
SA11sanss17u:79_0: śakyaṃ kṣayetuṃ āyuśriyâivarūpā na buddhastūpe dharayatâika dīpam //
SA11sanss17u:80_0: na tasya kāyo bhavati avarṇitâṅgo dṛḍhâsu bhotī parighabhujo 'chambhī /
SA11sanss17u:81_0: ālokaprāpto [[DOUBT]] vicarati sarvaloke daditva dīpaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanss17u:82_0: yadi buddhakṣetrā niyutaśatā sahasrā bhaveyu pūrṇā śikhagatasarṣapebhiḥ /
SA11sanss17u:83_0: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ tulayitu bhāṣituṃ vā na tathāgateṣū dharayitu ekadīpam /
SA11sanss17u:83_1: /alaṅkaritvā suruciradarśanīyaṃ yo deti chatraṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanss17u:84_0: tasyêha bhoty asadṛśâtmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ //
SA11sanss17u:85_0: yebhir jinasya pratapatâtmabhāvo rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yathariva [[DOUBT]] kāñcanasya /
SA11sanss17u:90_0: na bhogahānir bhavati kadācid asya devāna bhoti gurukṛta pūjitaś ca //
SA11sanss17u:92_0: na kāmabhogau ramati kadāci dhīro viśuddhaśīlaḥ sakuśalabrahmacaryaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:93_0: na jñānahānir bhavati kadācid asya na bodhicittaṃ vijahati so kathañcit /
SA11sanss17u:94_0: maitrīvihārī bhavati adīnacitto datvêha chattraṃ bhagavatacetikeṣu //
SA11sanss17u:95_0: vādyena pūjāṃ naravṛṣabhasya kṛtvā na śoka śalyavaśa jātu bhoti /
SA11sanss17u:96_0: manojñaghoṣo bhavati manuṣyaloke svarâṅgu tasyâvikala viśuddha bhoti /
SA11sanss17u:96_1: /viśuddhacakṣur bhavati sa saṃprajanyo viśuddhaśrotro bhavati udagracittaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:97_0: ghraṇêndriyaṃ paramôttapta bhoti vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanss17u:97_1: /jihvâsya bhoti surucira darśanīyā susūkṣma mṛdvī rucira manojña ghoṣā /
SA11sanss17u:98_0: raktā pravālā yathariva [[DOUBT]] devatānāṃ svarâṅga koṭīvara sṛjate 'prameyāṃ //
SA11sanss17u:99_0: na jātu bhotī uragu ajihvako vā na khañjakubjo nâpi ca nāmitâṅgaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:103_0: na jātu kaścij janaye prasādaṃ devo ca nāgo manuja mahôrago vā /
SA11sanss17u:104_0: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanss17u:105_0: kalpāna koṭīniyutaśatā sahasraṃ viśiṣṭakāyo bhavati aninditâṅgaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:106_0: prāsādiko 'sau kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
SA11sanss17u:108_0: vimānaśreṣṭhaṃ labhati manojñagandhaṃ divyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ suruciracandanasya /
SA11sanss17u:109_0: na jātu tṛṣṇāṃ janayati so kadācit saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya /
SA11sanss17u:109_1: /pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin na jātu bhotī upagata jambudvīpe /
SA11sanss17u:110_0: svarge sa bhoti pratiṣṭhita tasmi kāle gandhânulepaṃ dadiya jinasya stūpe /
SA11sanss17u:111_0: carī sa nityam imu vara brahmacaryaṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanss17u:112_0: itaś cyuto 'sau marupati svargaloke 'rthaṃ sahasrā tulayati nô cireṇa /
SA11sanss17u:113_0: karoti cârthaṃ suvipuladevatānāṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanss17u:114_0: viśiṣṭavākyo bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ priyo manāpo bahujanasatkṛtaś ca /
SA11sanss17u:115_1: sukhaṃ ca tasya bhavati sadā prasannaṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanss17u:116_0: apāyabhūmiṃ ... vijahāty aśeṣāṃ āsannako bhavati tathāgatānāṃ /
SA11sanss17u:117_0: prasādalabdhaḥ sada sukhi premaṇīyo gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanss17u:119_0: so 'kṣaṇaṃ vai vijahāti sarvaṃ aṣṭa kṣaṇāś câsya viśiṣṭa bhonti /
SA11sanss17u:120_0: buddhāna pūjām atuliya so karoti choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanss17u:120_1: / śūraś ca bhoti dṛḍhamatir apramatto na kāmabhoge 'bhiratiṃ janeti /
SA11sanss17u:121_0: naiṣkramyaprāptau câdīnacittaḥ choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanss17u:122_0: na bodhicittaṃ pramuṣyati tasya jātu akhaṇḍaśīlo 'sti susaṃvṛtaś ca /
SA11sanss17u:123_0: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhate viśuddhaṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanss17u:124_0: durvācatāṃ vijahati sarvakālaṃ prajñâbhāvaṃ ca jahāty aśeṣam /
SA11sanss17u:124_1: viśālaprajño viharati cārikāyāṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanss17u:125_0: lābhī ca bhotī śucibhojanānāṃ vastrān viśiṣṭān labhate suvarṇān /
SA11sanss17u:133_0: na tasya rājâpi praduṣṭacittaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneya caitye /
SA11sanss17u:133_1: /kumārga sarvaṃ pithitâpāyabhūmiḥ sa śīlaskandhe sthita bodhisatvaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:134_0: avatārayitvā jinacetikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ ca prāg anyanaraiḥ pradattaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:134_1: /śokāṃś ca doṣān vijahāty amatto rogān aśeṣān vijahāty anekān /
SA11sanss17u:135_0: āśvāsaprāptaś cânantakalpān yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
SA11sanss17u:137_0: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
SA11sanss17u:138_0: dadyāc ca yaḥ suruciradivya puṣpaṃ māndāravān apy atha pāṭalaṃ vā /
SA11sanss17u:139_0: nirmālyakaṃ yo 'panayeta caitye vipāka śreṣṭho 'sya bhaved atulyaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:139_1: /yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati nāthastūpaṃ chandaṃ janitvā ca sabuddhaloke /
SA11sanss17u:140_0: so bhoti loke gurukṛtu satkṛtaś ca prāsādiko bhavati sudarśanīyaḥ //
SA11sanss17u:141_0: tasyêha rājyaṃ nipatati sarvaloko devâsurā nāgamanuṣyakāś ca /
SA11sanss17u:142_0: sarvāḥ sahasrāḥ kusumita lokadhātuḥ praśāsti rājño vaśêśvarāṃś ca //
SA11sanss17u:143_0: ye tasya rājye sthita bhonti satvāḥ sthāpeya sarvān akaluṣabuddhajñāne /
SA11sanss17u:144_0: apāyabhūmyas tyaktā bhavanti karoti câiṣāṃ paramasuśreṣṭham artham //
SA11sanss17u:148_0: asya bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ puṇyair upetaḥ smṛtimatipūjanīyaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:149_0: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati jīvaloke sadâbhiprāyaṃ janayati śreṣṭhaprītiṃ //
SA11sanss17u:150_0: paricāra bhoty asya svarâṅga śuddhaḥ jñāyeta satvair madhurapraśāntavākyo /
SA11sanss17u:151_0: na tasya kaścij janayati cêśvaratvaṃ vilokanīyo bhavati mahājanasya /
SA11sanss17u:153_0: ākruṣṭaḥ san nâjanayeta roṣaṃ yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati buddhastūpaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:153_1: /devêndra bhoty upagatasvargaloke manuṣyako bhavati narasya rājā /
SA11sanss17u:154_0: na pārihāṇir bhavati kadācid asya yo 'ñjalībhir namatîha stūpaṃ //
SA11sanss17u:155_0: nâsāv apāye prapateta jātu hīnāṃś ca varjeta sa kāma loke /
SA11sanss17u:156_0: āḍhyo dhanī bhoti prabhūtakoṣo yo 'ñjalībhir namati buddhastūpam //
SA11sanss17u:157_0: sūtrântacaryā na kadācid asya nâsthānakopaṃ kurute nṛloke /
SA11sanss17u:158_0: satvāś ca tṛptā muditâsya bhonti yaḥ saṃpramuñcī guṇavati ekavācaṃ //
SA11sanss17u:161_0: sa puṇyavān bhavati manuṣyaloke rākṣe ca sthitvā jina satkaroti //
SA11sanss17u:162_0: śokā na doṣāḥ khilamala nâsya bhonti atulyatâptaś ca susaṃsthitâṅgaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:163_0: ālokanīyaś ca mahājanasya vrajeta kāmāna bhayakaravairaghorān /
SA11sanss17u:164_0: iti //āryamahākaruṇāpuṇḍarīkasūtre 'py uktaṃ /tiṣṭhatu tāvad ānanda yo māṃ saṃmukhaṃ satkuryāt /
SA11sanss17u:165_0: tiṣṭhatu me śarīrasya pūjā sarṣapaphalama-treṣu dhātuṣu /
SA11sanss17u:167_0: tiṣṭhatu mām uddiśya kṛteṣu stūpeṣu satkāraḥ /
SA11sanss17u:168_0: ye kecid ānanda buddham ālambyântaśâikapuṣpam apy ākāśe kṣepsyanti /
SA11sanss17u:169_0: tasya puṇyaskandhasya yo vipākaḥ saced yāvān anādiḥ saṃsāro yasya pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate /
SA11sanss17u:170_0: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsaratāṃ teṣāṃ śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ cakravartitvaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:173_0: saced antaśaḥ svapnântaragatâpi satvā buddham ālambyâkāśe ekapuṣpam api kṣepsyanti tad apy ahaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ vadāmîti /
SA11sanss17u:174_0: aṣṭābhir bhujagâdhipate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ satatasamitaṃ buddhasamavadhānaṃ pratilabhante /
SA11sanss17u:181_0: yatra ca buddhakṣetre tathāgataśravaṃ śṛṇvanti tatra praṇidhānam utpādayanti /
SA11sanss17u:190_0: kiṃ punar darśanaṃ sarvakāṅkṣācchedanam uttamam //sudṛṣṭo lokapradyotaḥ sarvadharmagatiṃ gataḥ /
SA11sanss17u:192_0: mahat puṇyam ayaṃ kṣetraṃ muditaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:195_0: na durgatibhayaṃ teṣāṃ yair ihârāgito jinaḥ //vipulaṃ jāyate cittaṃ paśyatāṃ dvipadôttamaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:196_0: prajñābalam asaṃkhyeyaṃ jāyate ca prabhāsvaraṃ //punar atrâivâha /
SA11sanss17u:204_0: varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānām aśrutir na ca //kiṃ kāraṇam apāyeṣu nivāsaś ciram iṣyate /
SA11sanss17u:208_0: saṃbhavaty avatāraś ca jñāne saṃbuddhagocare //kṣapayaty āvṛtīḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narôttamam /
SA11sanss17u:209_0: vardhayaty amitaṃ puṇyaṃ yena bodhir avāpyatae /
SA11sanss17u:212_0: tad evam asti puṇyavṛddhau buddhasamavadhānena prayojanaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:212_1: api ca pratimāmātradarśanam api tāvad aparimitaphalaṃ tathāgatānāṃ /
SA11sanss17u:213_0: kiṃ punaḥ svarūpeṇa // uktaṃ hy āryaśraddhābalâdhānâvatāramudrāsūtre /
SA11sanss17u:214_0: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajôpamānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dine dine śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyāt divyāni ca vastrāṇi /
SA11sanss17u:216_0: yaś cânyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā citrakarmalikhitaṃ vā pustakakarmakṛtaṃ vā buddhaṃ paśyed /
SA11sanss17u:218_0: kaḥ punar vādo yo 'ñjalipragrahaṃ vā kuryāt puṣpaṃ vā dadyāt dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dadyād /
SA11sanss17u:219_0: ayam eva tato 'saṃkhyeyataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatîti //āryabodhisatvapiṭake 'pi puṇyavṛddhyupāyôktaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:220_0: yas tathāgatacaityaṃ śodhayati sa catasro 'grāḥ praṇidhānaviśuddhīr anuprāpnoti /
SA11sanss17u:234_0: na śrutavikalo na prajñāvikalo na praṇidhānavikalêti //
SA11sanss17u:236_0: ye tribhavaparyāpannāḥ satvās te sarve pratyekaṃ tathāgatastūpān kārayeyur evaṃrūpān uccaistvena /
SA11sanss17u:238_0: tāṃś ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratyekaṃ sarvasatkāraiḥ satkuryuḥ /
SA11sanss17u:240_0: ayaṃ tasmāt pūrvakāt puṇyaskandhād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //atrâivôktaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:241_0: ye khalu punas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve mahāyānasaṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanss17u:242_0: sarve ca cakravartirājyasamanvāgatā bhaveyur ekâikaś ca rājā cakravartī mahāsamudrapramāṇadīpasthālīṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanss17u:243_0: sumerumātrāṃ vartīm ādīpya pratyekam evaṃrūpāṃ dīpapūjāṃ tathāgatacaityeṣu pravartayet /
SA11sanss17u:244_0: yaś câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvas tailaprakṣiptāṃ vartīṃ kṛtvâdīpya tathāgatacaitye dhārayet /
SA11sanss17u:245_0: asyās tailaprakṣiptāyā varter etat pūrvakaṃ pradīpadānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti /
SA11sanss17u:246_0: yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti /
SA11sanss17u:248_0: ye ca khalu punas te rājānaś cakravartino buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃ-
SA11sanss17u:250_0: ghaṃ sarvasukhôpadhānaiḥ satkuryuḥ yaś câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvaḥ piṇḍapātraṃ caritvā pātraparyāpannaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhajya paribhuñjīta /
SA11sanss17u:251_0: idaṃ tato bahutaraṃ ca mahârghataraṃ ca /
SA11sanss17u:252_0: yac ca te rājānaś cakravartinaḥ sumerumātraṃ cīvararāśiṃ buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dadyuḥ /
SA11sanss17u:253_0: yac câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvas tricīvaraṃ bahirdhā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vā tathāgatacaitye vā dadyād /
SA11sanss17u:254_0: idaṃ bhikṣoś cīvaradānam etat pūrvakacīvararāśim abhibhavati /
SA11sanss17u:255_0: yac ca te rājānaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṣpasaṃstṛtaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatacaitye niryātayet /
SA11sanss17u:256_0: yac câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvaḥ antaśâikapuṣpam api tathāgatacaitye āropayet /
SA11sanss17u:257_0: asya dānasyâitat pūrvakaṃ dānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti /
SA11sanss17u:261_0: caturêmān bhadrânuśaṃsān paśyan bodhisatvas tathāgatapūjāyām utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanss17u:263_0: agraś ca me dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūjito bhaviṣyati
SA11sanss17u:266_0: tathāgataṃ ca pūjayitvā bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss17u:267_0: dvātriṃśatāṃ ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃmukhadarśanena kuśalamūlam upacitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss17u:268_0: imāś catvāraḥ iti //idaṃ ca niruttaraṃ tathāgatapūjôpasthānaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:273_0: yac ca satveṣu mahākaruṇācittam utpādayatîti //nirdiṣṭam apy āryaratnameghe /
SA11sanss17u:274_0: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvânanuliptā garbhamalena jāyante /
SA11sanss17u:284_0: tac ca nirāmiṣeṇa cittena na sâmiṣeṇa /
SA11sanss17u:287_0: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā nirupaliptā garbhamalena jāyantām iti /
SA11sanss17u:289_0: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhir dharmair iti //anumodanânuśaṃsās tv āryaprajñāpāramitāyām uktāḥ /
SA11sanss17u:290_0: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ tāṃś cittôtpādān anumodate /
SA11sanss17u:290_1: caratām api bodhisatvacaryāṃ tāṃś cittôtpādān anumodate /
SA11sanss17u:291_0: avinivartanīyām api avinivartanīyadharmatām anumodate bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ /
SA11sanss17u:293_0: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati //
SA11sanss17u:294_0: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat /
SA11sanss17u:296_0: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ palâgreṇa tulyamānasasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ /
SA11sanss17u:297_0: na tv eva kauśika bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittôtpādānāṃ puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ /
SA11sanss17u:297_1: /evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanss17u:299_0: ye bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittôtpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃ-
SA11sanss17u:301_0: bodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām evam aprameyam anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyam iti na śṛṇvanti na jānanti /
SA11sanss17u:303_0: mārapakṣikās te bhagavan satvā bhaviṣyanti //bhagavān āha /
SA11sanss17u:305_0: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cême cittôtpādânumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā /
SA11sanss17u:306_0: te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti /
SA11sanss17u:306_1_0: / bhagavān āha //evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittôtpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatrôpapatsyante
SA11sanss17u:306_1_1: tatra tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś cârcitāś câpacāyitāś
SA11sanss17u:309_0: evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣûpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargôpapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā /
SA11sanss17u:311_0_0: tathā hi taiḥ satvaiḥ sarvasatvasukhâvahanāni asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ kuśalamūlāny
SA11sanss17u:311_0_1: anumoditāni yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyâprameyâsaṃkhyeyān satvān
SA11sanss17u:314_0: dīvālikôpameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasatvās te sarve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratitiṣṭheyur anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prati-
SA11sanss17u:316_0: ṣṭhāya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān upalambhasaṃjñinaś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran /
SA11sanss17u:317_0: yaś ca bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayôpāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītâtītânāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ /
SA11sanss17u:318_0_1: sarvam ekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣam anumodetâgrayânumodanayā
SA11sanss17u:319_0: asya subhūte 'numodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau pūrvakâupalambhikānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyâbhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti yāvad upaniṣada-
SA11sanss17u:320_0: m api na kṣamatae iti //ayam eva nayaḥ pariṇāmanāyām uktaḥ /
SA11sanss17u:321_0: athavâgrapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmitatvāt sarvapuṇyānām asya buddhatvāya satkṛtapraṇidhibuddhatvam eva syāt /
SA11sanss17u:324_0: adhyeṣaṇāyās tv anuśaṃsâryôgraparipṛcchāyām uktā dharmagrāhyatām upādāyâprameyâsaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv āyuḥ parirakṣaṇāyêti /
